alert.note: Alert for Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 27 at 3:45PM EDT until April 27 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... West central Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 245 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms capable of producing both tornadoes and extensive straight line wind damage were located over Panama City Beach, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * These dangerous storms will be near... Panama City and Tyndall Air Force Base around 300 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Biltmore Beach, St Andrews State Park, Edgewater Gulf Beach, Gulf Lagoon Beach, Magnolia Beach, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach and Bid-a-Wee. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
